description:
Charatomi was once well-known as a U-tuber, but his job hunting isn`t going well. He makes a comeback as a U-tuber in an attempt to escape from his job search. He meets Nuke-kubi, a youkai who has no doubt about his popularity. Zeroing in on his ability to create bursts of hot and cold air, Charatomi partners with him to stream videos. In a flash, the two become popular. Charatomi schemes to reach even greater heights of popularity, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 自己愛暴発! ぬけ首危機一髪
